backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor handling user profiles, access control, and data types for cashflow, properties, loans, and wealth entries.
backend/migration.mo: Simple migration module copying lastId from old actor state to new.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented MPL module features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files covering styling, routing, components, and feature modules.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS theme defining light and dark mode color variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the appâ€™s router structure and layout, including the new /match-pl route.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication gate that shows login UI until Internet Identity authentication completes.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting new users to save their display name via backend user profile APIs.
Defines the main app layout with header, navigation, mobile menu, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/navigation/NavLi: Renders navigation buttons with icons and highlights the active route.
frontend/src/features/cashflow/api.ts: Provides React Query hooks to list, summarize, create/update, and delete cashflow entries via the backend actor.
frontend/src/features/cashflow/component: Displays cashflow entries in a table with edit/delete actions and deletion confirmation.
Form card for adding or editing a cashflow entry with validation and submission via mutation.
Shows cards summarizing total to collect, total to give, and net balance with styled indicators.
frontend/src/features/daily-pl/api.ts: Fetches the generated daily profit/loss report from the backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/features/daily-pl/component: Displays daily profit/loss summaries in a table sorted by date.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/api.ts: Loads dashboard metrics including net worth, property value, lending portfolio, wealth inputs, and computed monthly cash flow.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/componen: Shows a KPI card displaying formatted monthly cash flow from interest income.
Provides quick navigation buttons for adding new loans or properties.
Renders a donut chart summarizing property, lending, and wealth input values, with a fallback when no data exists.
frontend/src/features/lending/api.ts: Provides React Query hooks to list, add/update, and delete loans using the backend actor API.
frontend/src/features/lending/components: Displays bar and pie chart insights for loan interest and principal vs interest totals, with a placeholder when no loans exist.
Form card for creating or editing loans, handling validation, submission, and form resets via mutation hooks.
Renders a loans table with computed totals, edit/delete actions, and a confirmation dialog for deletions.
frontend/src/features/mpl/api.ts: Provides React Query hooks for matches, entries, P/L summaries, and settlement operations with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/features/mpl/components/Cre: Dialog for creating new matches with basic validation and submission through the match creation API.
frontend/src/features/mpl/components/Ent: Displays a card with a table of betting entries, handling loading and empty states.
Provides a form to create a new betting entry with validation and mutation submission.
frontend/src/features/mpl/components/Mat: Shows match details, P/L summary, entries list, and settlement UI with back navigation.
Renders a list of matches with status badges and a button to select a match.
frontend/src/features/mpl/components/Set: Dialog for selecting a winning team and settling a match via mutation.
frontend/src/features/mpl/utils/pl.ts: Implements P/L calculations for teams based on betting entries and entry types.
frontend/src/features/networth/api.ts: React Query hooks for listing, updating, and summarizing wealth inputs and net worth data.
frontend/src/features/networth/component: Displays four summary cards for net worth, property, lending, and wealth inputs.
Form component that loads, edits, validates, and submits wealth input fields using related API hooks.
frontend/src/features/properties/api.ts: React Query hooks for listing, creating/updating, and deleting properties via the backend actor.
frontend/src/features/properties/compone: Displays a grid of property cards with edit and delete actions, including confirmation dialog and formatting helpers.
Form for adding or editing a property, handling field population, validation, submission, and reset.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor based on identity changes and invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for Internet Identity login, identity persistence, and auth client management.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base setup defining light/dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point configuring React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/CashflowPage.tsx: Displays cashflow summary, entry form, and entries table with edit handling and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/DailyProfitLossPage.t: Generates and displays daily profit/loss totals with summary cards and a detailed table.
frontend/src/pages/ExecutiveDashboardPag: Shows dashboard overview with monthly cashflow KPIs, quick actions, and wealth distribution visuals.
frontend/src/pages/MatchProfitLossPage.t: Manages match list and detailed match profit/loss views with loading and selection handling.
frontend/src/pages/MoneyLendingPage.tsx: Manages loan creation/editing, displays loans table, and shows lending insights with loading fallback.
frontend/src/pages/NetWorthPage.tsx: Loads and displays net worth summary cards and wealth input form with error and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/PropertyLedgerPage.ts: Handles property creation/editing and displays property grid or empty-state message.
frontend/src/queryInvalidation.ts: Defines helper functions to invalidate related React Query caches for various modules.
frontend/src/queryKeys.ts: Defines structured React Query keys for loans, properties, wealth inputs, dashboards, cashflow, daily PL, and MPL.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Formats numbers into INR currency strings using Indian locale conventions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom OKLCH color system, animations, typography/container-queries plugins, and extended theme settings for a FinTech-style UI.
project_state.json: Defines the project's architecture, modules, and requirements for a React/Tailwind frontend with a Motoko backend, including lending, property, net-worth, cashflow, and M(P/L) betting tracker features.
